name: Decline Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Lie face up on a decline bench
Have a spotter carefully hand you the dumbbells over head
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the dumbbells until your arms are parallel with the floor without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the dumbbells back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench
